top_comments.comment: I just made these and I toasted the nuts first and ohhhhhhhhh my goodness you were so right!👩‍🍳💕🍾🥂 everything I have ever made from your channel has turned out fabulous (and I have made many) thank you John I hope you and your family have a very blessed holiday season🙏👩‍🍳‼️I appreciate your dedication and hard work 💕🎅🤶🎄
Thank you so much for listing the recipe in grams. Will be baking these tomorrow. Just bought 25lbs of pecans from the farm today.
